title: In the service of peace
brief_description: Considers the work of the United Naitons in preserving peace throughout the world. Looks at various trouble-spots where UN forces are involved, particularly Cyprus. Here troops are maintaining surface peace and quiet between the Greeks and Turks. Highlights the training and activities of the Swedish contingent.
